Introduction

Haruto is a Japanese singer under YG Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group TREASURE.

In 2018, Haruto took part in YG Entertainment's survival show, YG Treasure Box. Following his participation, he was revealed as the first member of the boy group on the show's final episode. The group was subsequently named TREASURE.

Haruto officially debuted as a member of TREASURE on August 7, 2020, with their single album, "The First Step: Chapter One".
